name: subgraph to support shifting links
description:

it's in the idea graph, but we can't put it in the requirements graph unless we also put it in the context
(remember, the idea graph is literally everything ever, and the context is the part we care about)

this specifically pertains to subgraph.match
do we ... ignore the context's links (the outer graph)?
the hardcodedsensor transform moves idea links around
